author: onofre
msg: Add a event package to store all action listener.
Create the first action listener for the project buttons in the accordion pane.
Now the project window knows which project to consider and the location of the CruiseControl file.

author: onofre
msg: Add a dedicated class to load the CruiseControlConfigurator configuration file.
Use this class in the project accordion pane.

msg: Add empty tab in project window.
